/opt/GCC/730/bin/g++    -pipe -m64 -fsigned-char -pthread -std=c++11  -L/home/wuchenguang/usr/lib -rdynamic CMakeFiles/map.dir/main.cpp.o  -o map  -L/opt/ROOT/root61600/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ROOT/root61600/lib /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libCore.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libImt.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libRIO.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libNet.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libHist.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libGraf.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libGraf3d.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libGpad.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libROOTDataFrame.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libTree.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libTreePlayer.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libRint.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libPostscript.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libMatrix.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libPhysics.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libMathCore.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libThread.so /opt/ROOT/root61600/lib/libMultiProc.so
